```{r}

```{r}
Xsamples <- rbinom(1000,50,.7)
less_than_30_observed <- sum(Xsamples<30)
less_than_30_predicted <- pbinom(29,50,.7)
ggplot()+geom_histogram(aes(x=Xsamples),bins=50,binwidth=1)+xlim(0,50)+ggtitle('Binomial Samples, p=.7, N=50')
```

```{r}
clean_up <- function(s) {
    valid <- c(letters, LETTERS, " ", seq(0, 9)) # a vector of the things I want to keep
    split_string <- strsplit(s, "")[[1]]
    keepers <- split_string[split_string %in% valid]
    keepers <- tolower(gsub(" ", "_", keepers))
    paste(keepers, collapse = "")
}
